thread.title: Dr. Bruce Felgenhauer
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Dr. Bruce Felgenhauer

author: Dr. Bruce Felgenhauer
title: Dr. Bruce Felgenhauer
text: I have been purchasing several items from this company for years, especially the sockeye salmon that arrives quickly and frozen solid in easy to use vacuum packing. I also have enjoyed the breakfast selections and love them with whole wheat pancakes and fresh blueberries. The supplements, especially those with Tumeric are also a extremely health addition to my daily supplement routine. Fast, friendly service from this fine company for many years and hopefully for many to come, thanks for providing us with fresh healthy seafood!
